Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
  ShoppingCart

public class ShoppingCart
extends Object

This class models a shopping cart.

It maintains a collection of Product objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Product

          Creates an empty shopping cart.

toString

public String toString()
Obtains a String representation of all the products in this shopping cart.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
if cart is not empty, a String with the information of every product in cart; otherwise the String "empty".
See Also:
Product.toString()

getTotalValue

public double getTotalValue()
Computes the total value of the products in this shopping cart.

This is done by summing the values of each product.

Returns:
the total value of the products in this shopping cart.

Product.getValue()
